item.title: BNP stages nationwide demo; Inqilab Manch holds protest rally
item.description: The Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP) on Saturday organised a nation-wide protest programme to condemn the heinous assassination attempt on Inqilab Manch founder Osman Hadi, who was shot by miscreants on Friday noon.
